lightsout.domain

Class StandardBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • lightsout.domain.StandardBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Board
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Klein, Moebius, Torus

    public class StandardBoard
extends Object
implements Board
    Board consisting of bulbs shaped like a square.
    Author:
    Tuomas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean[][] board
      Boolean matrix representing the board.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StandardBoard(int size)
      Constructor creates a square board of lights, represented by boolean square matrix, with side of length size

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isLit(int x, int y)
      Simple getter.
      boolean isSolved()
      Checks whether the board is solved.
      void makeMove(int x, int y)
      Given row and column, toggles the bulb on their intersection and also the bulb's neighbours.
      boolean properIndices(int x, int y)
      Checks whether given row and column are within limits.
      void randomize()
      For each bulb on the board randomly chooses whether it is lit or not.
      void reset()
      Resets the board so that all lights are on.
      int size()
      Gives the length of a side of the board
      void toggle(int x, int y)
      Given row and column, toggles the bulb on their intersection.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • board

        protected boolean[][] board
        Boolean matrix representing the board. Boolean value true corresponds to a bulb being lit.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StandardBoard

        public StandardBoard(int size)
        Constructor creates a square board of lights, represented by boolean square matrix, with side of length size
        Parameters:
        size - length of a side of the board

      • isLit

        public boolean isLit(int x,
            int y)
        Simple getter. Given row and column, tells whether the bulb on their intersection is lit or not.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        x - row
        y - colum
        Returns:
        true iff bulb is lit

      • isSolved

        public boolean isSolved()
        Checks whether the board is solved. That is whether all lights are off.
        Specified by:
        isSolved in interface Board
        Returns:
        true iff board is solved

      • properIndices

        public boolean properIndices(int x,
                    int y)
        Checks whether given row and column are within limits.
        Parameters:
        x - row
        y - column
        Returns:
        true iff row and column are between 0 and board.length - 1.

      • randomize

        public void randomize()
        For each bulb on the board randomly chooses whether it is lit or not.
        Specified by:
        randomize in interface Board

        public void reset()
        Resets the board so that all lights are on.
